title: siripput-tAn varugudaiyE
sahitya:
siripput-tAn varugudaiyE ulagaik-kaNDAl siripput-tAn varugudaiyE


anupallavi

  erippinai vaittuLLE inippAghap-pEshiyE ettukkaDaiyAi vAzhum pittar kUTTattaik-kaNDAl


caraNam 1    pallai iLittuk-kATTum paghaTTirkkuk-koTTuvAr pashi enum Ezhaiyaip-parivinrit-tiTTuvAr
selvam koLLai aDittu siraiyilE pUTTuvAr tiruDar miraTTinAlE tiravu kOlai nITTUvAr
    caraNam 2    paramporuL arivinaip-payinrik-kUsuvAr pallukkum seruppukkum paNangaLai vIsuvAr
varam tara vENDiyE nirantaram azhuvArgaL vAimaiyAi muyal enrAl vaLLena vizhuvArgaL
    caraNam 3    nAmE sakama enru nATakam AduvAr nAlu dAsarum pinnE nAmAvaLi pADuvAr
EmALigaLai eikkum kOmALk-kUttukkaL ettanai ettanai pittulagattil andO
